src:
Sederet PR Berat Dirjen Pajak Baru Suryo Utomo
02 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati dan Dirjen Pajak baru Suryo Utomo/Foto: Antara Foto

Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati telah melantik Suryo Utomo sebagai Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru. Suryo Utomo menggantikan Robert Pakpahan yang masuk masa pensiun.Pelantikan Suryo Utomo berlangsung di Kementerian Keuangan (Kemenkeu) Jakarta, kemarin (1/11/2019)."Pada hari ini Jumat 1 November 2019 saya Menteri Keuangan dengan ini resmi melantik pejabat yang baru di Kementerian Keuangan," kata Sri Mulyani.Sri Mulyani mengatakan, banyak pekerjaan yang menanti Suryo Utomo. Sri Mulyani juga menegaskan, pekerjaan yang diemban Dirjen Pajak sangat berat.Berikut berita selengkapnya dirangkum detikcom:(hns/hns)
text:
In line with the heavy duty the new tax director general Suryo Utomo
02 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati and new Director General of Tax Suryo Utomo / Photo: Antara Photo

Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati has installed Suryo Utomo as the new Director General of Taxation. Suryo Utomo replaces Robert Pakpahan who is retiring. Suryo Utomo's inauguration took place at the Ministry of Finance (Ministry of Finance) Jakarta, yesterday (1/11/2019). Ministry of Finance, "said Sri Mulyani. Sri Mulyani said, there was a lot of work waiting for Suryo Utomo. Sri Mulyani also emphasized that the work carried out by the Director General of Taxes was very heavy. The following complete news was summarized by AFP: (hns / hns)
